languages.text: "Даже когда глаза многих открыты, слепы они", — так говорила Мать-паучиха. Люди смотрят на вещи и сути их не видят, потому их легко обмануть, напугать. Костьми праведных мы украшаем туннели, и паству они ограждают от скверных деяний и мыслей. На крови нечистых гадаем, дабы опасность узреть. Кровь мучеников — наше вино, ибо страдания их делают нас сильнее. Люди боятся, но потому лишь, что видят в смерти конец, тогда как смерть есть начало, и жизнь, и долг, и забвение. Смерть многогранна — и в том ее суть. В том красота".

"'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our faithful against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers. The blood of martyrs is our wine, for their suffering makes us stronger. People are afraid, but only because they see death as the end. Death, however, is a beginning. It is life and duty and oblivion. Death has many facets — that is its essence. That is its beauty."
languages.original_text: "Даже когда глаза многих открыты, слепы они", — так говорила Мать-паучиха. Люди смотрят на вещи и сути их не видят, потому их легко обмануть, напугать. traits.locale_text: "'Many are blind even as their eyes are wide open.' Thus spoke the Founder of the Weave. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or to frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our flock against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers. The blood of martyrs is our wine, for their suffering makes us stronger. People are afraid, but only because they see death as the end; death, however, is a beginning, it is life and duty and oblivion. Death has many facets; that is its essence. That is its beauty."

languages.text: "'Viele sind blind, selbst sehenden Auges.' So sprach die Matriarchenspinne. Viele blicken Dinge an, ohne deren Essenz zu sehen, weshalb sie leicht zu übertölpeln oder zu verängstigen sind. Wir schmücken die Tunnel mit den Knochen der Rechtschaffenen, auf dass sie unsere treuen Anhänger vor verdorbenen Taten und Gedanken beschützen können. Wir nutzen das Blut der Unheiligen zur Prophetie, um Gefahren vorhersehen zu können. Das Blut von Märtyrern ist unser Wein, denn ihr Leid macht uns stärker. Wer Angst hat, der hat dies nur, weil er den Tod als das Ende ansieht. Der Tod ist jedoch ein Anfang. Er ist das Leben und die Pflicht und das Vergessen. Der Tod hat viele Facetten, das ist seine Essenz. Das ist seine Schönheit."
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. languages.text: «"Muchos son ciegos aun con los ojos abiertos". Así habló la Araña Matriarca. La gente mira a las cosas sin ver su esencia, lo que hace que sean fáciles de engañar o asustar. Adornamos los túneles con los huesos de los justos, para que guarden a nuestros fieles de los pensamientos y actos corruptos. Usamos la sangre de los impíos para adivinaciones que nos previenen contra el peligro. La sangre de los mártires es nuestro vino, pues su sufrimiento nos hace más fuertes. La gente tiene miedo, pero solo porque entiende la muerte como el final. Sin embargo, la muerte es un principio. Es vida, deber y olvido. La muerte tiene muchas facetas: esa es su esencia. Esa es su belleza».
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our faithful against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers. The blood of martyrs is our wine, for their suffering makes us stronger. People are afraid, but only because they see death as the end. Death, however, is a beginning. It is life and duty and oblivion. Death has many facets — that is its essence. That is its beauty."

Esa es su belleza».

languages.text: 「『多くの者は、目は見開いていても何も見えていない』そう、蜘蛛の師母は語った。人々はその本質を見ることなく物事を見る。我らは正義の者の骨でトンネルを飾り、堕落した行いや考えから、忠実なる者を守る。汚れた者の血でディビネーションを行うことで、危険を察知するのだ。不浄の者の血は我らにとってのワインであり、彼らの苦しみが我らをさらに強くする。人々は死を恐れているが、それは死を終わりだとみなしているからに他ならない。死は、しかし、始まりである。それは生であり、義務であり、忘却である。死には様々な面がある。それが本質だ。それが美しさなのだ」
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our faithful against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers. The blood of martyrs is our wine, for their suffering makes us stronger. People are afraid, but only because they see death as the end. Death, however, is a beginning. It is life and duty and oblivion. Death has many facets — that is its essence. That is its beauty."

traits.locale_text: 「『多くの者は、目は見開いていても何も見えていない』そう、ウィーヴの創始者は語った。人々はその本質を見ることなく物事を見る。我らは正義の者の骨でトンネルを飾り、堕落した行いや考えから、忠実なる者を守る。汚れた者の血でディビネーションを行うことで、危険を察知するのだ。不浄の者の血は我らにとってのワインであり、彼らの苦しみが我らをさらに強くする。人々は死を恐れているが、それは死を終わりだとみなしているからに他ならない。死は、しかし、始まりである。それは生であり、義務であり、忘却である。死には様々な面がある。それが本質だ。それが美しさなのだ」

languages.text: “‘许多人睁着双眼，却目不视物。’这是蛛母族长赐予我们的教诲。人们看待事物时，往往看不到它们的本质，所以他们才会那么容易遭到欺骗、恐吓。我们用义人的遗骨装点隧道，愿他们守护我们的信徒，让我们的信徒免受败坏的行为与思想所害。我们用邪恶之人的鲜血进行占卜，这样我们就能看到危险。至于殉道者的鲜血，则是我们的美酒，因为他们的苦难会使我们更加坚强。人们惧怕死亡，不过是因为他们将死亡看作一切的终结。然而，死亡也象征着开始，它代表着充满责任与湮灭的人生。死亡有许多不同的侧面，这便是它的本质，它的美妙之处。”
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our faithful against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers. It is life and duty and oblivion. Death has many facets — that is its essence. That is its beauty."

languages.text: « "Nombreux sont les aveugles, quand bien même ils ont les yeux grands ouverts." Ainsi parla l'araignée matriarche. Les gens regardent les choses sans discerner leur essence, ce qui les rend d'autant plus vulnérables à la peur et à la manipulation. Nous tapissons les tunnels d'ossements des justes, pour qu'ils gardent nos fidèles des pensées et agissements impurs. Nous nous servons du sang des mécréants pour nos rituels divinatoires afin de voir les dangers qui nous guettent. Le sang des martyrs est notre vin, car leur souffrance nous rend plus forts. Si les gens ont peur, c'est uniquement parce qu'ils voient la mort comme la fin de tout, alors qu'en réalité, ce n'est qu'un début. La mort est tout à la fois la vie, le devoir et l'oubli. Elle a de nombreuses facettes, c'est son essence même et ce qui fait toute sa beauté. »
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. Elle a de nombreuses facettes, c'est son essence même et ce qui fait toute sa beauté. »

languages.text: "'Niceleri, gözleri fal taşı gibi açıkken bile kördür.' İşte Örümcek Kraliçe böyle buyurmuştur. İnsanlar, bir şeylere bakarken özünü görmezler. Bu da onları kandırmayı ve korkutmayı kolaylaştırır. Tünelleri erdemlilerin kemikleriyle süsleriz ki inançlılarımızı yozlaşmış eylemler ve düşünceler karşısında koruyabilsinler. Kehanetler için uğursuzların kanını kullanırız ki tehlikeleri görebilelim. Şehitlerin kanı şarabımızdır çünkü onların çektikleri acılar bizi daha güçlü kılar. İnsanlar korkuyor çünkü ölümü bir son olarak görüyorlar. Lakin ölüm bir başlangıçtır. O yaşamdır, vazifedir ve unutuluştur. Ölümün pek çok yüzü vardır. Bu da onun özüdür, onun güzelliğidir."
languages.original_text: "'Many are blind even with their eyes wide open.' Thus spoke the Matriarch Spider. People look at things without seeing their essence, which makes them easy to beguile or frighten. We adorn the tunnels with the bones of the righteous, that they may guard our faithful against corrupt deeds and thoughts. We use the blood of the unholy ones for divination so we may see dangers.
